import React from "react"; import MyHeader from "../../components/MyHeader"; export default function Privacy(){ return ( <>

我们非常重视对您的个人信息保护，也理解您可能关心您的个人信息处理过程，因此我们制订了本政策，阐述我们如何收集、使用、披露、共享以及储存您的个人信息。当您开始连接我们的网站或使用我们提供的任一产品或服务时，即表示您已同意我们按照本政策来合法处理您的个人信息。,请在使用我们的产品或服务前，仔细阅读并了解本《个人信息保护政策》。

We will collect your personal information based on the following circumstances: one When you visit our website, participate in our website activities, or obtain online or offline services through our website (including but not limited to registering as a member user, contacting us through email to ask questions, participating in online surveys, applying for test drives, or participating in brand club activities, etc.), you should fill in the personal information you registered on your own, such as name, phone number, email address, etc. two Personal social media information provided when you follow our social media (such as Weibo, WeChat, Tiktok, etc.), or information disclosed when you publish your personal information through public accessible means (such as Weibo, WeChat, Tiktok, etc.). three We will obtain your personal information from our partners through the following methods: A We obtained the personal information you provided when applying for a loan to purchase Hyundai Motor China from a financial company; B We have collected your personal information from our other business partners and/or service providers (including their affiliated and non affiliated companies), such as the personal information you provided to the exhibition organizers during your participation in the auto show C We may also collect personal information about you from other public sources and add it to our customer information database. four When you visit our website, we will use cookies and other tracking technologies to understand your usage of the Hyundai China website, in order to provide more targeted and valuable product information and services to different groups of customers. You understand and agree that we will collect your information (such as login status, login time, login validity) through cookies and may combine the collected information with your other information. Most browsers will automatically open cookies, but you can adjust your browser settings at any time and choose to close cookies. five When you call our service hotline or call center, in order to improve service quality and follow up on your request, we may collect your personal information (such as name, province, phone number, purchase intention, etc.) from you during the call, or record the call through electronic media. You understand and agree that we will collect your personal information and record your phone calls during the voice call process. six When you download or use applications developed by us or our designated third parties (such as in car systems), we may collect personal information such as your geographic location, vehicle condition, mobile device specific identification codes (such as specific numbers that identify the user's mobile device) through these applications. These data will be used to determine the approximate location of you, your device, or your vehicle, so that we can provide and improve our positioning services or other personalized services. You understand and agree that we collect personal information such as geographical location, vehicle condition, mobile device specific identification codes, etc. seven When you use our website or any other means for job applications or inquiries, we may require you to provide relevant information such as your resume. We may analyze and use your information during this process to process your query requirements or for recruitment reasons. ) }
